name: Astrology
overview: Draw astrological charts based on birth date and birthplace. The Astrology program computes the location of the sun, moon and planets at the time of a person's birth and displays the result on a horoscope using finely detailed graphics. A chart of the aspects of the sun, moon and planets also displays. Keplerian elements are used to compute the various positions to an accuracy of one to two degrees for any time this century.
